name: GetJournalList
description:
Retrieve a list of accounting journals.

Use this tool to get a list of accounting journals. It's useful for accessing journal entries in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization to retrieve journals for.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: journal_entry_number
parameters.description: Search journals by journal entry number using exact match or variants like 'entry_number_startswith' and 'entry_number_contains'.

value_schema.description: Search journals by journal entry number. Variants: entry_number_startswith and entry_number_contains

parameters.name: search_by_reference_number
parameters.description: Search journals by reference number. Use 'startswith:' or 'contains:' for filtering options.

value_schema.description: Search journals by journal reference number. Variants: reference_number_startswith and reference_number_contains

parameters.name: journal_date_search
parameters.description: Specify date criteria to search journals. Use date_start, date_end, date_before, or date_after.

value_schema.description: Search journals by journal date. Variants: date_start, date_end, date_before and date_after

parameters.name: search_journal_notes
parameters.description: Search journals by their associated notes. Options: 'startswith' or 'contains'.

value_schema.description: Search journals by journal notes. Variants: notes_startswith and notes_contains

parameters.name: search_by_last_modified_time
parameters.description: Search for journals using the last modified time as a filter criterion. Provide a valid timestamp to filter entries updated after that time.

value_schema.description: Search the journals using Last Modified Time

parameters.name: journal_total_filter
parameters.description: Filter journals based on total amount using keys like total_less_than or total_greater_equals.

value_schema.description: Search journals by journal total. Variants: total_less_than, total_less_equals, total_greater_than and total_greater_equals

parameters.name: search_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Use a specific Customer ID to search for journals in Zoho Books.

value_schema.description: Search Journals using Customer ID

parameters.name: vendor_id
parameters.description: Specify the Vendor ID to search journals associated with that vendor.

value_schema.description: Search the journals using Vendor ID

parameters.name: filter_journals_by_date
parameters.description: Specify the time period to filter journals by date. Options: JournalDate.All, JournalDate.Today, JournalDate.ThisWeek, JournalDate.ThisMonth, JournalDate.ThisQuarter, JournalDate.ThisYear.

value_schema.description: Filter journals by journal date. Allowed Values: JournalDate.All, JournalDate.Today, JournalDate.ThisWeek, JournalDate.ThisMonth, JournalDate.ThisQuarter and JournalDate.ThisYear

parameters.name: sorting_column_for_journals
parameters.description: Specify the field to sort journals by. Options: 'journal_date', 'entry_number', 'reference_number', 'total'.

value_schema.description: Sort journal list. Allowed Values: journal_date, entry_number, reference_number and total

parameters.name: page_number_to_fetch
parameters.description: Page number of the journal list to retrieve. Default value is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of journal records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
